description:
"Nikita" may be about to kick off its swan song season, but before The CW's spy series ends for good you can own a piece of the action.《尼基塔》最后一季即将上演，不过在这部CW间谍剧结束之前，你还有机会行动起来，买到些拍摄时的道具。

With production of the final season of "Nikita" officially wrapped, thousands of items from the show are going on sale to the public in Toronto. From props to wardrobe items to set pieces, you can shop the sale.《尼基塔》最后一季制作已经正式结束，千余件拍摄道具将会在多伦多公开售卖。从演员们的演出服到各种道具，你都能买到。

What kind of merchandise and memories can fans buy? Kitchenware, artwork, linens, lamps, and all kinds of furniture and electronics -- including televisions, tablets, and mobile phones -- are up for sale.粉丝们具体都能买到些什么呢？厨具、艺术品、床上用品、灯具以及各种家具、电器——包括电视机、桌子甚至是手机。

The fourth and final season -- consisting of six episodes -- premieres Friday, Nov. 22 at 9 p.m. ET on The CW.《尼基塔》第四季，也就是最后一季一共只有6集，将会在北京时间11月23日开播。

title: 尼基塔大结局拍摄完毕 剧组卖道具
